donuts.name: Glazed Donut

content.overview: Classic sweet donut with a shiny glaze, a timeless treat.
preparation: Mix flour, yeast, sugar, milk, and butter into dough.
Shape into rings, fry at 175°C until golden.
Dip in warm glaze, let cool.
tips: Use fresh yeast for best rise.

donuts.description: Classic sweet donut with shiny glaze.

donuts.name: Jelly-Filled Donut

content.overview: Soft donut stuffed with fruity jelly, a delightful surprise inside.
preparation: Prepare yeast dough with flour, yeast, and egg.
Shape into balls, let rise for 45 minutes.
Fry at 180°C, inject with jelly after cooling.
tips: Use thick jelly to avoid leaks.

donuts.description: Soft donut stuffed with fruity jelly.

donuts.name: Boston Cream Donut

content.overview: Rich cream-filled donut topped with chocolate glaze.
preparation: Make yeast dough, shape into balls.
Fill with custard using a piping bag.

donuts.description: Rich cream-filled donut with chocolate glaze.

donuts.name: Old-Fashioned Donut

content.overview: Crispy, cake-like donut with a rustic, textured finish.
preparation: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, and egg.

donuts.description: Crispy, cake-like donut with a rustic twist.

donuts.name: Apple Cider Donut

content.overview: Spicy apple-flavored cake donut with a seasonal vibe.
preparation: Blend apple cider into flour, sugar, and cinnamon batter.
Roll in cinnamon-sugar mix while warm.

donuts.description: Spicy apple-flavored cake donut.

donuts.name: Cronut

content.overview: Flaky croissant-donut hybrid, a trendy fusion treat.
preparation: Layer butter into yeast dough like croissant.
Cut into rings, let rise for 2 hours.

donuts.description: Hybrid of croissant and donut, flaky and sweet.

donuts.name: Mochi Donut

content.overview: Chewy Japanese-style donut with a unique mochi texture.
preparation: Mix mochi flour with sugar and water.
Shape into rings, fry at 170°C until chewy.
Cool, sprinkle with sesame if desired.

donuts.description: Chewy Japanese-style donut with a unique texture.

donuts.name: Beignet

content.overview: Light French donut, dusted with powdered sugar.
preparation: Mix flour, yeast, and sugar into dough.
Drain excess oil, dust with powdered sugar.
tips: Use a deep fryer for even cooking.

donuts.description: Light French donut, perfect with coffee.

donuts.name: Cinnamon Sugar Donut

content.overview: Warm, spicy-sweet treat rolled in cinnamon sugar.
preparation: Prepare yeast dough, shape into rings.
Roll in cinnamon-sugar mix while warm.

donuts.description: Warm, spicy-sweet treat.

donuts.name: Maple Bacon Donut

content.overview: Sweet-salty combo with a smoky bacon twist.
preparation: Glaze with maple syrup, top with crispy bacon.
tips: Cook bacon crisp but not burnt.

donuts.description: Sweet-salty combo with a smoky twist.

donuts.name: Sprinkles Donut

content.overview: Fun, colorful donut for all ages with sprinkles.
preparation: Dip in glaze, add sprinkles immediately.

donuts.description: Fun, colorful donut for all ages.

donuts.name: Chocolate Frosted Donut

content.overview: Rich chocolate-coated classic donut.

donuts.description: Rich chocolate-coated classic donut.

donuts.name: Jelly Donut

content.overview: Traditional jam-filled delight with a sugary coat.
preparation: Make yeast dough, shape into balls.
Inject with jam, dust with sugar.
tips: Fill while warm but not hot.

donuts.description: Traditional jam-filled delight.

donuts.name: Apple Fritter

content.overview: Chunky apple donut with a sweet glaze.
preparation: Mix flour, sugar, and chopped apples.

donuts.description: Chunky apple donut with sweet glaze.

donuts.name: Matcha Donut

content.overview: Earthy green tea-flavored donut with a unique taste.
preparation: Fry at 170°C, dust with matcha powder.

donuts.description: Earthy green tea-flavored donut.

donuts.name: Ube Donut

content.overview: Vibrant purple Filipino donut with yam flavor.
preparation: Mix ube into dough, shape into rings.
tips: Use fresh ube for authentic taste.

donuts.description: Vibrant purple Filipino donut.

donuts.name: Savory Cheese Donut

content.overview: Unique savory donut with cheesy goodness.
preparation: Mix cheese into dough, shape into rings.
tips: Don’t overcook to keep cheese melty.

donuts.description: Unique savory donut option.

donuts.name: Long John

content.overview: Elongated cream-filled donut with a smooth glaze.
preparation: Make yeast dough, shape into logs.
tips: Use a piping bag for even filling.

donuts.description: Elongated cream-filled donut.

donuts.name: Cruller

content.overview: Twisted, crunchy cake donut with a light glaze.
preparation: Mix flour, sugar, and egg into dough.

donuts.description: Twisted, crunchy cake donut.

donuts.name: Churros

content.overview: Crispy Spanish donut sticks rolled in cinnamon sugar.
preparation: Pipe dough into sticks, fry at 180°C.
tips: Use a star tip for texture.

donuts.description: Crispy Spanish donut sticks.
